OOC: I thought the rule meant for every post you had to accept some. 
Oh well.

BIC: Mutate reconizes this new bot and flies down.

Mutate: My dear friend. I know much more than I knew when I last saw 
you, but I still don't know what is going on on this planet. Is your 
war with the Maximals over, or is this a continuation. That bot said 
he wasn't a Predicon, but wanted me dead when he thought I was a 
Maximal. Do you know what's happening?

He was intentionally trying to sound smart because he didn't want 
Rampage to think he was the retarded bot he had once befriended 
although he was still a friend. He also felt that this was an 
immotional moment that called for advanced dialogue.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm gonna say yeah, because I am not sure what JP did with him 
when
> he first brought him back. Kslawdogg do you know? Yeah it is moding 
not
> to accept dammage, but I am accepting dammage, I got hit by your 
stun
> gun, and Megatron's main arm dosent work. Plus I've already accepted
> lots of dammage this fight, from KSLawdogg (could you respond to
> Spasstik's attacks big guy:) and Prowl. Plus I am going somewhere 
with
> this.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Megatron did not let any of this faze him. He was suprised this was 
not
> a Maximal. "Never call me a Predacon." Megatron said through 
clenched
> teeth. He strained to raise his cannon arm again, aiming at Mutate. 
With
> a quivering strain, he aimed at the mutated creature.
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
--
> 
> Rampage rode over the terrain, his treads grinding the earth. He 
looked
> up at the two hovering robots. "Ahhh it is you my friend." He 
whispered,
> when he then noticed the one robot aiming at him. "It can't be,
> Megatron, ho ho ho, we are going to have fun here. HERE ARE SOME 
IRON
> RATIONS." he screamed as his gattling gun barrel turned, then fired 
off
> a rocket at the Decepticon leader. The shell screamed off towards 
the
> Decepticon leader, leaving a trail of smoke as it slammed into
> Megatron's back, tearing a hole into his armor, and sending him
> plummeting to the ground.
